ai-mil7.6.8:1.1_0: “Venerable Sir, what definitely did you say?”
ai-mil7.6.8:1.2_0: “Great king, wherever he’s back, that cluster is, he took it up, fresh and dragged down.
ai-mil7.6.8:1.3_0: In the same way, when a meditator with a stick, the object of his mind is slipped down, that is to say, a place in the sign, and he should stand firm in, delivering, and that object, he should apprehend the sign thus: ‘I am standing in the deliverance.’
ai-mil7.6.8:1.4_0: This is the burning coals that bring one!
